Issue.creator: senthil1
Issue.summary: txmgr: release write lock only if it was acquired
Issue.description: In the transaction manager, we need to release the write lock only if the lock was acquired. When an error occurs before acquiring a lock and if we try to release the unacquired lock in the defer statement, we would end up printing the wrong panic message (i.e., fatal error: sync: unlock of unlocked mutex) which would be less helpful during troubleshooting.
